page.title: 18CHURCHES
page.content: In Birtley there are two main churches. One is called St. Josephs which is a Roman Catholic church, the other main church is St Johns which is a Church of England church. There is also a Methodist church in Birtley, which was built on Station Lane. There are two little churches, the Salvation Army which is on Lansbury Drive, and the Assembly of God which is near the Salvation Army. There is a church in Lamesley which is called St Andrews. There are two churches in Kibblesworth. One is Methodist. The vicar from St. Johns comes to our school every week. He used to take the service, but now he takes some pupils for singing. Churches also have clubs like Boys Brigade, Cubs and Guides. Our Headmaster was ordained a priest on June 3Oth 1985.
